With over 30 years of experience in the furniture industry, AFI manufactures, designs, and imports solid hardwood furniture and mattresses. We work hard to maintain our strong commitment to quality, safety, and the environment, designing each of our pieces with sustainability in mind.
AFI Furnishings is a global leader in safe, sustainably sourced home furnishings. We produce our furniture with a focus on safety by design to better protect our customers for years to come.
